main event: Several citizens reported sighting unidentified flying discs in the sky over Fargo, North Dakota on April 25, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as reddish, round, and reflecting city lights., Observations lasted for about 15 minutes., The flight patterns appeared as a wide 'V' formation., Initial sightings led to them being identified as migrating ducks., Observers initially thought they were encountering unidentified aerial phenomena.
witness description: civilians who observed from various locations in Fargo
